flowRoot.flowPara: When you use Windows, your freedoms are compromised by proprietary software that locks you out from control of your own computer.
Windows monitors what you download and sends that information back to HQ. It can also delete programs without warning you.
Windows has bad security methods that could expose your personal information.
Open the door to better computing.
When you use a free operating system, you can count on freedom, transparency, and privacy.
Say goodbye to forced upgrades, planned obsolescence, and other anti-features designed to serve Microsoft's bottom line, not your best interest.
Free software is developed by a dedicated community of people who care about ethical computing.
and close Windows for good, visit:
